data.eml:eml: A new species of Hydrocyphon Redtenbacher, 1858 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) from Kopet Dagh Mountains

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruta, Rafal (2007): A new species of Hydrocyphon Redtenbacher, 1858 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) from Kopet Dagh Mountains. Zootaxa 1521: 59-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177443
